Text: The Great Mosque of Algiers (Arabic: الجامع الكبير‎ ‎ , "Jemaa Kebir") or “Djama’a al-Kebir” (meaning Great Mosque) is a mosque in Algiers, Algeria, located very close to Algiers Harbor.
Triplets:<The Great Mosque
1:
--------------------
<Text: Djamaâ el Kebir:  An inscription on the minbar (منبر) or the pulpit testifies to fact that the mosque was built in 1097.>
Triplets:<Djamaâ el Kebir
5:
--------------------
Text: Djamaâ el Kebir:  It was built under sultan Ali ibn Yusuf.

Text: Djamaâ el Kebir:  The gallery at the outside of the mosque was built in 1840.
